title: Documentary
subject_group: Advertising, Film, Journalism, Mass Media & TV/Motion pictures - History
Advertising, Film, Journalism, Mass Media & TV/Motion pictures - Excerpts
abstract: Nanook of the north (1922)--The Man with the movie camera (1928)--New earth--Nightmail (1936)--The River (1938)-- The City (1939)--Triumph of the will (1934)--Listen to Britain (1942)-- Night and fog (1956)--The Return--The Quiet one (1948)--Sit-in--Primary-- Hour of the furnaces--Harlan County USA (1976).
description: A compilation film of major sequences from famous documentaries. Each sequence offers an important example of documentary style, content and construction. A brief introduction prior to each segment provides a historical context. This film is also available for loan in 3 parts: 1922-1939 (506297), 1935-1955 (506298), 1948-1976 (506299).
